name: ASquare Renewable
overview:
Established in the year 2012, we, “A Square Renewable Energy” are counted among the leading and trusted traders and suppliers of a comprehensive range of Solar Roof Top System, Solar Street Light, Solar Home Light, Solar Water Heater, Energy Efficient LED and Solar Pumping System.

About Director: MBA-Marketing from the Recognize University More than 13 years of the Experiences in the Solar Thermal Technology & Solar Photovoltaic Technology M.E. Electronics Engineer More than 10 years Experience in the electronics industry

Our Motto: “A Square Renewable Energy is founded by the people who know the economically where the power is important in the future and present. Today the Electricity provided by the Government in India is so costly or it’s not viable for the people who living in the Rural Area. The Motto of the Company is to give the Cost Effective Renewable products to all the people of the nation and world.”

Facts About Solar Energy: Solar Energy Can Be Used for Heat and Electricity Solar Energy Is Everywhere the Sun Shines California Has the World’s Biggest Solar Power Plant Europe Has Some Large Photovoltaic Power Plants Solar Power Can Be Used Almost Anywhere at a Variety of Scales Photovoltaic Cells Convert Sunlight into Electricity

Benefits of Solar/ LED Lighting: No Uv & IR radiation No environmentally hazardous substances (CFL contains Mercury) No more bugs around lights (LED’s don’t attract insects) No laying down electrical wires and digging hassles requires which usually consume close to a month’s time for completion

Management Team: Procuring Agents Quality Controllers Sales and Marketing Executives Warehousing and Packaging Professionals Logistics Professionals Allied workforce
